name: topGO
description: Executes a TopGO enrichment analysis originating from a differential expression analysis. See the input descriptions for formatting instructions if you are supplying your own file. Those created within WebMeV are already in the correct format.

feature_table.description: A table of diffential expression results. Must have "overall_mean" and "padj" columns for the process to understand how to read the table. We need "overall_mean" column to generate an empircally matched background distribution and the "padj" column to classify a gene as differentially expressed or not.
feature_table.name: Differential expression results:

organism.description: The organism/genome for your data. If you do not see your organism, please request it!
organism.name: Genome/organism:

gene_identifier.description: The gene identifier used in the input table of differential expression results.
gene_identifier.name: Gene identifier:

ontology.description: The ontology class to analyze. This analysis can be re-run multiples times to get results for each.
ontology.name: Ontology choice:

pvalue_threshold.description: The significance value (p-value, adjusted p-value, FDR) threshold which determines whether a gene is considered differentially expressed or not.
pvalue_threshold.name: P-value threshold:

min_size.description: The minimum number of genes required to be assigned to a GO term. GO terms associated with fewer genes will be removed from analysis.
min_size.name: Minimum GO term size:

max_result_size.description: The maximum number of GO terms to report in the analysis output.
max_result_size.name: Number of GO term results:
